• Monitor and report on the continuously evolving laws and regulations impacting the non banking finance industry.
• Ensure adherence to these laws, regulations and policies
• Serve as a point-of-interface for the resolution of compliance-related issues in the business when directed. 
• Serve as a point-of-interface for all regulatory audits and enquiries.
